articles.author: MARK THIESSEN
articles.description: ANCHORAGE, Alaska (AP) — Millions of people worldwide tuned in for a remote Alaska national park’s “Fat Bear Week” celebration this month, as captivating livestream camera footage caught the chubby predators chomping on salmon and fattening up for the winter.
articles.title: It's not just Fat Bear Week in Alaska. Trail cameras are also capturing wolves, moose and more

articles.author: SAMY MAGDY and BASSEM MROUE
articles.description: BEIRUT (AP) — Palestinians in northern Gaza described heavy Israeli bombardment Saturday in the hours after airstrikes killed at least 22 people, as Israel continued to tell people there and in southern Lebanon to get out of the way of its offensives against the Hamas and Hezbollah militant groups.
articles.title: Heavy Israeli bombardment in northern Gaza as UN peacekeepers in Lebanon are hit again

articles.author: RUSS BYNUM, BRENDAN FARRINGTON and TY ONEIL
articles.description: BRANDON, Fla. (AP) — Florida residents who fled hundreds of miles to escape Hurricane Milton made slow trips home on crowded highways, weary from their long journeys and the cleanup work awaiting them but also grateful to be coming back alive.
articles.title: Floridians evacuated for Hurricane Milton after wake-up call from devastating Helene

articles.author: STEPHANY MATAT and CHRISTOPHER L. KELLER
articles.description: WELLINGTON, Fla. (AP) — Tony Brazzale, a diving boat captain who has lived for 10 years in his Wellington home in southeastern Florida, wasn't worried about Hurricane Milton.
articles.title: Far from where Hurricane Milton hit, tornadoes wrought unexpected damage

articles.author: ANTHONY IZAGUIRRE
articles.description: NELSONVILLE, N.Y. (AP) — Voters in a ring of congressional districts encircling New York City where Republican candidates often do well but Donald Trump struggled in 2020 could decide which party controls the U.S.
articles.title: Fight for House raging in districts ringing NYC where Trump struggled but other Republicans thrived

articles.author: MATT BROWN
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Barack Obama had frank words for Black men who may be considering sitting out the election. “Part of it makes me think that, well, you just aren’t feeling the idea of having a woman as president, and you’re coming up with other alternatives and other reasons for that,” he said Thursday to Harris-Walz campaign volunteers and officials at a field office in Pittsburgh.
articles.title: Obama’s callout to Black men touches a nerve among Democrats. Is election-year misogyny at play?

articles.author: SEAN MURPHY and JUAN A. LOZANO
articles.description: FORT WORTH, Texas (AP) — Attack ads on every TV break. Campaign money pouring in. And on a sunny Saturday, a crowd stretching out the door for a campaign rally at Tulip's, a popular Fort Worth nightclub — this time for Democratic U.S.
articles.title: Ted Cruz and Colin Allred wage another big US Senate fight in Texas

articles.author: DARLENE SUPERVILLE
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Vice President Kamala Harris is in “excellent health” and “possesses the physical and mental resiliency” required to serve as president, her doctor said in a letter released Saturday that summarizes her medical history and status.
articles.title: Doctor deems Harris in 'excellent health.' Her team aims to contrast with Trump's scant medical info

articles.author: JEFF McMURRAY
articles.description: CHICAGO (AP) — Dominique Davenport was waiting for a ride home after getting off the MetroLink light rail one night in East St. Louis, Illinois, when he heard an argument followed by gunshots behind him on the station's platform.
articles.title: Transit systems are targeting fare evaders to win back riders leery about crime

articles.author: MARCIA DUNN
articles.description: CAPE CANAVERAL, Fla. (AP) — A NASA spacecraft is ready to set sail for Jupiter and its moon Europa, one of the best bets for finding life beyond Earth.
articles.title: NASA's Europa Clipper spacecraft will scour Jupiter moon for the ingredients for life
